title: Internal compiler error when matching a slice against two byte vectors.

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
```
rustc 0.11.0-pre-nightly (5d5c20647f45f2eb74f337e5434bbe63b0c43345 2014-07-03 21:46:47 +0000)
```

``` rust
fn main() {
    let buf = vec!(1,2,3,4);
    match buf.slice(0,3) {
         b"abc" => {},
         b"def" => {}
    };
}
```

```
error: internal compiler error: unexpected failure
note: the compiler hit an unexpected failure path. this is a bug.
note: we would appreciate a bug report: http://doc.rust-lang.org/complement-bugreport.html
```
